strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_CROCOMANYPOISONED_DESCRIP: As Acrid, have 20 enemies poisoned or blighted at once
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_CROCOPOISONDAMAGE_DESCRIP: As Acrid, deal a total of 500,000 damage with poison or blight
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_BANDIT2LONGINVIS_DESCRIPT: As Bandit, remain invisible for a total of 3 minutes in a run
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_BANDIT2FASTKILLS_DESCRIPT: As Bandit, kill 3 enemies in under 1 second
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_CAPTAINSTAGENOBEACON_DESC: As Captain, complete a stage past stage 3 without having deployed any orbital beacons
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_CAPTAIN3MOUNTAINTELEPORTE: As Captain, survive a Teleporter event after activating 3 Shrines of the Mountain
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_COMMANDOFINISHTELEPORTERL: As Commando, finish a Teleporter event under 20% health
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_COMMANDOM1KILLS_DESCRIPTI: As Commando, kill 20 enemies in a row without releasing primary fire
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_ENGIMULTIPLEELECTRICITEMS: As Engineer, have 4 different electric items at once
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_ENGIKILLVAGRANTMINE_DESCR: As Engineer, land the killing blow on a Wandering Vagrant with a mine
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_HUNTRESSPRIMARYUTILITYONL: As Huntress, complete a teleporter event without using your secondary or special skills
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_MERCEXPOSEENEMIES_DESCRIP: As Mercenary, strike 10 unique exposed enemies with no more than 5 seconds between each strike
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_TOOLBOTMANYDRONES_DESCRIP: As MUL-T, have 8 drone followers at once
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_TREEBOTMANYCLOSEKILLS_DES: As REX, kill 100 enemies in close range in a single run
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_RAILGUNNERHIGHCRIT_DESCRI: As Railgunner, reach +200% bonus critical strike damage
strings.ACHIEVEMENT_ES_VOIDFIENDMANYFORMCHANGE_D: As Void Fiend, change forms 6 times during a single Teleporter event
